description:
A lord discovers a new favorite fish.  A man is given a bottomless pitcher of sake that almost ruins his life.  A giant carp sinks a boat.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Meguro Saury / Kappa Dokkuri / The Giant Carp That Sank a Boat
Meguro no Sanma / Kappa Dokkuri / Fune o Shizumeta Oogoi
目黒のさんま / 河童徳利 / 舟を沈めた大鯉
